name: seo-prospector
title: SEO Prospector — Automated Lead Gen for Web Designers & Agencies
tagline: Find local businesses with bad websites, research them, and generate personalized outreach — all on autopilot.
description:
Turn your OpenClaw into a lead generation machine. SEO Prospector discovers local businesses with weak web presence, runs technical SEO audits, generates detailed prospect reports, and creates personalized HTML outreach emails — all automated via cron jobs.

Includes:
• Full research pipeline (SEO audit + web research + report generation)
• HTML email templates (mobile-responsive, Outlook-compatible)
• Plain text + LinkedIn + DM outreach templates
• Prospect database with dedup and cluster rotation
• Daily pipeline summaries delivered to Discord
• 30-cluster industry rotation schedule
• Verification system (filters dead URLs and parked domains)
• Config-driven — set your agency name, city, phone once

Perfect for freelance web designers, small agencies, and SEO consultants who want a steady stream of qualified local prospects without manual cold-calling.

apis: perplexity (for web research — free tier works)

changelog.changes: Initial release — full pipeline with HTML email templates, prospect verification, cluster rotation, and config-driven agency branding.
